column6: People are trying to kill Ike Harris.  He remembers things he shouldn't and for that he must die.  Join New York Times bestseller NEIL GAIMAN and comic-god JOHN ROMITA, JR to uncover the mystery of Ike Harris and the mystery of creation itself!
column8: | penciller (cover):Rick Berry | writer:Neil Gaiman | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | letterer:Todd Klein | inker:Danny K. Miki | penciller:John Romita JR.
